channel.title: PI Sandwich lady random
channel.description: Hi guys, on my server i got sandwich lady random to work and to tele people away when they click wrong. But now it still has another glitch, when they click the thieving stalls before the interface is opened, it just closes again. Any idea how i can fix this? Help would be appreciated!

item.title: PI Sandwich lady random
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

There’s not much we can do to help without any code.

But what’s happening is the server is registering a click at the time the interface is trying to open.
So it closes the interface to finish the action. Think of it like opening a interface then clicking the minimap (Actually this might be an issue for you )

Read full topic
